author: scriptingstudio
body:
Why does `get-service` not return `pathname` but `get-ciminstance win32_service` does? Are the underlying methods different? `Get-service` is much faster than `get-ciminstance win32_service` with filter. 

It relates to #9826 but no resolution yet.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
It is dup #3322.

We need a solution for all supported OS but underlying API from .Net Core does not support this.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Feature request: Get-service "pathname" return property
